headline: Research Veteran Yardeni Ends 15-Year Tech Bet With Underweight Mag 7 Call
summary: “We see more competitors coming for the juicy profit margins of the Magnificent 7,” and expect that the productivity and profit margins of the rest of the S&P 500 will be boosted by tech, said Wall Street research veteran Ed Yardeni.  The Magnificent 7 stocks were mixed in premarket trading on Monday, with Tesla Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Nvidia Corp. underperforming peers.  The Magnificent 7 merits special caution as “they’re competing more aggressively against each other and they’ve got more competition coming out of nowhere” Yardeni said in an interview with Bloomberg Television on Monday.

content.title: Research Veteran Yardeni Ends 15-Year Tech Bet With Underweight Mag 7 Call
content.summary: “We see more competitors coming for the juicy profit margins of the Magnificent 7,” and expect that the productivity and profit margins of the rest of the S&P 500 will be boosted by tech, said Wall Street research veteran Ed Yardeni.  The Magnificent 7 stocks were mixed in premarket trading on Monday, with Tesla Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Nvidia Corp. underperforming peers.  The Magnificent 7 merits special caution as “they’re competing more aggressively against each other and they’ve got more competition coming out of nowhere” Yardeni said in an interview with Bloomberg Television on Monday.

headline: Morgan Stanley Hands Tesla Stock A New Rating, Sees Musk Hitting This Many Pay Deal Milestones
summary: Tesla received a price-target hike and a rating change from Morgan Stanley on Sunday as the analyst sees the automaker hitting several of the targets laid out in CEO Elon Musk's new pay package, valued at around $1 trillion.  TSLA shares angled lower before Monday's stock market open.  Morgan Stanley analyst Andrew Percoco took over from Adam Jonas on Sunday and assumed coverage of Tesla stock with an equal weight rating, giving TSLA a 425 price target.

content.title: Morgan Stanley Hands Tesla Stock A New Rating, Sees Musk Hitting This Many Pay Deal Milestones
content.summary: Tesla received a price-target hike and a rating change from Morgan Stanley on Sunday as the analyst sees the automaker hitting several of the targets laid out in CEO Elon Musk's new pay package, valued at around $1 trillion.  TSLA shares angled lower before Monday's stock market open.  Morgan Stanley analyst Andrew Percoco took over from Adam Jonas on Sunday and assumed coverage of Tesla stock with an equal weight rating, giving TSLA a 425 price target.

headline: IBM's $9.3B Confluent deal, WBD latest, Tesla downgrade
summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman outlines three stories trending during Monday's trading session. IBM (IBM) is set to buy Confluent (CFLT) in a $9.3 billion deal. Paramount Skydance (PSKY) announced an all-cash offer to buy Warner Bros. (WBD), countering the recently announced Netflix (NFLX) deal. Morgan Stanley analysts downgraded Tesla (TSLA). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: IBM's $9.3B Confluent deal, WBD latest, Tesla downgrade
content.description:
Morning Brief host Julie Hyman outlines three stories trending during Monday's trading session.

IBM (IBM) is set to buy Confluent (CFLT) in a $9.3 billion deal.

Paramount Skydance (PSKY) announced an all-cash offer to buy Warner Bros. (WBD), countering the recently announced Netflix (NFLX) deal.

Morgan Stanley analysts downgraded Tesla (TSLA).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
content.summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman outlines three stories trending during Monday's trading session. IBM (IBM) is set to buy Confluent (CFLT) in a $9.3 billion deal. Paramount Skydance (PSKY) announced an all-cash offer to buy Warner Bros. (WBD), countering the recently announced Netflix (NFLX) deal. Morgan Stanley analysts downgraded Tesla (TSLA). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
